backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing required dark-theme UI updates and the affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of auto‑generated summaries for all frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/posts/convolutional-neur: Markdown note introducing CNNs and their core architectural components.
frontend/public/posts/image-segmentation: Markdown note explaining semantic, instance, and panoptic segmentation and related architectures.
frontend/public/posts/introduction-to-co: Markdown introduction to computer vision fundamentals and classical vs. deep learning methods.
frontend/public/posts/manifest.json: JSON manifest indexing all blog posts with metadata, tags, and filenames.
frontend/public/posts/object-detection-m: Markdown note covering object detection fundamentals and modern two‑stage detectors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with index and post routes and search param validation.
Fallback component showing a not‑found message and link back to the main list.
frontend/src/components/layout/BlogHeade: Sticky header with navigation that clears search params when returning home.
frontend/src/components/layout/BlogLayou: Root layout wrapping pages with header, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/markdown/Markdow: Simple markdown-to-HTML parser converting headings, lists, code, and links.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Post preview card with tag chips and navigation to filtered list or post detail.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostSearch: Search input component for filtering posts by title or tags.
frontend/src/components/posts/TagFilterB: Renders tag filter buttons and a clear option, calling onSelectTag when tags are toggled.
Implements client-side post filtering using text search and optional tag matching.
frontend/src/features/posts/posts.static: Fetches the post manifest and individual post markdown files from static endpoints.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for post metadata, manifests, and posts with content.
frontend/src/features/posts/postTags.ts: Provides utilities to extract unique tags and normalize tag arrays from post metadata.
frontend/src/features/posts/usePosts.ts: React Query hooks to load, sort, and fetch post metadata and individual post content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for static-asset-based blog.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theming, including light/dark palettes and markdown styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with metadata, markdown content, and tag navigation; handles loading and errors.
frontend/src/pages/PostListPage.tsx: Lists posts with search and tag filtering, showing results or fallback messages based on filters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, features, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for build planning.
